title: Lincoln's WARNING #100002: Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up
script: Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up? Let me explain the CON: They got you arguing about CRUMBS while they eating the whole CAKE! Left vs Right? That's the SHOW! Real fight is UP vs DOWN, but they keep you fighting LEFT vs RIGHT! WAKE UP! Bitcoin below. Stop scrolling. Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up? They're selling you fear while pocketing profit. Classic misdirection. Now you know what they didn't want you to see. Support truth. Bitcoin below.
